greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle whose n-th row is the multiset spanning an initial interval of positive integers with multiplicities equal to the n-th row of A296150 (the prime indices of n in weakly decreasing order).
xref: Row lengths are A056239. Number of distinct elements in row n is A001222(n). Number of distinct multiplicities in row n is A001221(n).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Aug 23 2018
